freq-enable.description: Enable/disable frequency synchronization in virtual access scenarios.

time-enable.description: Enable/disable time synchronization in virtual access scenarios.

freq-check-enable.description: Enable/disable frequency offset detection on the clock board.

wtr-time.description: WTR time for a Down interface.

holdoff-time.description: Holdoff time of the clock source after an interface changes from normal to abnormal.

out-threshold.description: Lowest SSM level of the clock signals output by the BITS interface.

ssm-unk-map.description: Map UNK to an SSM level so that the clock source with the unknown SSM level can be selected.

max-out-ssm-sys.description: Highest SSM level of the output system clock signals. If the SSM level of a system clock is greater than the set highest SSM level, the system clock signals are output based on the highest SSM level.

max-out-ssm-2m1.description: Highest SSM level of the output 2M-1 clock signals. If the SSM level of a 2M-1 clock is greater than the set highest SSM level, the 2M-1 clock signals are output based on the highest SSM level.

max-out-ssm-2m2.description: Highest SSM level of the output 2M-2 clock signals. If the SSM level of a 2M-2 clock is greater than the set highest SSM level, the 2M-2 clock signals are output based on the highest SSM level.

domain.description: PTP device domain. Only devices in the same PTP domain can be synchronized.

dly-measure-enable.description: Enable/disable auto-measurement of ring-network asymmetry delay of optical fibers. If enabled, the fiber length change will be tested as the interface connecting to the fiber goes from Down to Up.

passive-measure-enable.description: Enable/disable performance monitoring. If performance monitoring is enabled on passive interfaces and devices remain in a stable time synchronization state, devices will monitor the time offset values (between the master and slave devices) on passive interfaces every 1000s.

passive-alarm-threshold.description: Set passive alarm threshold. After performance monitoring is enabled on passive interfaces, if the time offset value between the master and slave devices exceeds the alarm threshold, an alarm indicating that the passive interface optical fiber length has changed will be reported to the NMS.

time-source.description: Type of the local PTP clock source.

accuracy.description: Accuracy of the local PTP clock source.

clk-class.description: Class of the local PTP clock source.

priority1.description: Priority1 of the local PTP clock source.

priority2.description: Priority2 of the local PTP clock source.

ptp-local-clock-id.description: Number of the local PTP clock source.

va-ap-bits-srcs.description: List of configure virtual access bits attributes of a single AP.

va-ap-bits-src.description: Configure virtual access bits attributes of a single AP.

phy-bits-sabit.description: Sa timeslot used by the BITS interface to send or receive the SSM level.

phy-bits-type.description: BITS signal type. The value depends on the BITS type.

ptp-bits-direction.description: Transmission direction of BITS signals. If the signal type is 1PPS, you must specify the input and output directions of BITS signals. The value depends on the BITS type.

ptp-bits-recv-delay.description: Delay for receiving BITS time signals.

ptp-bits-send-delay.description: Delay for sending BITS time signals.

va-remote-clocks.description: List of configure remote physical interface.

phy-sync-enable.description: Enable/disable clock synchronization for the physical clock source.

cfg-ssm.description: Configure the physical layer SSM level.

va-remote-ptps.description: List of configure remote time interface.

ptp-port-enable.description: Enable/disable 1588v2 for PTP interface clock sources.

ptp-delay-mechanism.description: Delay measurement mechanism for PTP packets, including Delay or Pdelay.

ptp-clock-step.description: Clock step mode: one-step or two-step.

ptp-pkt-pack-type.description: PTP packet encapsulation mode. A PTP packet can be encapsulated in a Layer 2 frame or in a Layer 3 UDP packet.

ptp-mac-egress-dest-mac.description: Destination MAC address for a PTP packet encapsulated in a Layer 2 frame.

ptp-mac-egress-vlan-id.description: VLAN ID for a PTP packet encapsulated in a Layer 2 frame.

ptp-mac-egress-pkt-priority.description: Packet priority of a PTP packet encapsulated in a Layer 2 frame.

ptp-udp-egress-src-ip.description: Source IP address for a PTP packet encapsulated in a Layer 3 UDP packet.

ptp-udp-egress-dest-ip.description: Destination IP address for a PTP packet encapsulated in a Layer 3 UDP packet.

ptp-udp-egress-dscp.description: DSCP value for a PTP packet encapsulated in a Layer 3 UDP packet.

ptp-udp-egress-vlan-id.description: VLAN ID for a PTP packet encapsulated in a Layer 3 UDP packet.

ptp-udp-egress-pkt-priority.description: Priority of a PTP packet encapsulated in a Layer 3 UDP packet.

ptp-udp-egress-dest-mac.description: Destination MAC address for a PTP packet encapsulated in a Layer 3 UDP packet.

ptp-announce-interval.description: Interval at which Announce packets are sent on a PTP interface. the calculation formula for the interval in seconds is (2 to the power of interval/1024)s.

ptp-announce-receipt-timeout.description: Timeout occurrences of announce packet receiving on the PTP interface. If the number of timeouts exceeds the set value, the newly received Announce packets will enter the timeout processing procedure.

ptp-sync-interval.description: Interval at which Sync packets are sent on a PTP interface. the calculation formula for the interval in seconds is (2 to the power of interval/1024)s.

ptp-min-delay-req-interval.description: Minimum interval at which Delay_Req packets are sent on a PTP interface. the calculation formula for the interval in seconds is (2 to the power of interval/1024)s.

ptp-min-pdelay-req-interval.description: Minimum interval at which Pdelay_Req packets are sent on a PTP interface. the calculation formula for the interval in seconds is (2 to the power of interval/1024)s.

ptp-announce-drop.description: Enable/disable an interface to discard the received Announce packets.

va-clock-ports.description: List of configure AP clock port.

ptp-correction-flag.description: Signal flag of correction value. Calculate the correction value after auto-measurement of ring-network asymmetry delay is enabled and asymmetry delay of optical fibers is tested, including positive and negative flags as well as the value to be corrected, and set the value on the interface.

ptp-correction-value.description: Correction-value. Calculate the correction value after auto-measurement of ring-network asymmetry delay is enabled and asymmetry delay of optical fibers is tested, including positive and negative flags as well as the value to be corrected, and set the value on the interface.

freq-enable.description: Enable/disable frequency synchronization in virtual access scenarios.

time-enable.description: Enable/disable time synchronization in virtual access scenarios.

freq-check-enable.description: Enable/disable frequency offset detection on the clock board.

wtr-time.description: WTR time for a Down interface.

holdoff-time.description: Holdoff time of the clock source after an interface changes from normal to abnormal.

ssm-unk-map.description: Map UNK to an SSM level so that the clock source with the unknown SSM level can be selected.

max-out-ssm-2m1.description: Highest SSM level of the output 2M-1 clock signals. If the SSM level of a 2M-1 clock is greater than the set highest SSM level, the 2M-1 clock signals are output based on the highest SSM level.

max-out-ssm-2m2.description: Highest SSM level of the output 2M-2 clock signals. If the SSM level of a 2M-2 clock is greater than the set highest SSM level, the 2M-2 clock signals are output based on the highest SSM level.
